channel.title: Pages on SQL by example
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on SQL by example

item.title: About
item.author: slh.peyman@gmail.com (Peyman Salehi)
item.description: The idea of this project is to have a cheat sheet for SQL for different DBMSs like PostgreSQL and MySQL. If you find any issues or want to add more examples, feel free to open an issue or send a pull request in GitHub.
